dialog: Overall, your ${pokemon_name} is not likely to make much headway in battle.
Overall, your ${pokemon_name} has certainly caught my attention.
Overall, your ${pokemon_name} is a wonder! What a breathtaking Pokemon!
Overall, your ${pokemon_name} may not be great in battle, but I still like it!
Overall, your ${pokemon_name} is a decent Pokemon.
Overall, your ${pokemon_name} is a strong Pokemon. You should be proud!
Overall, your ${pokemon_name} simply amazes me. It can accomplish anything!
Overall, your ${pokemon_name} has room for improvement as far as battling goes.
Overall, your ${pokemon_name} looks like it can really battle with the best of them!
